topicTitle: Replacement for the Current Minecraft Map

posts.postText:
Everytime the gm_minecraft map gets chosen the server bursts with the rage of a thousand geeks. 
To rectify this I suggest this ttt minecraft map:  ttt_minecraft_b3  .

Just a suggestion. 

PS: FIRST POST!

+Support this.

I think everyone can agree, the Minecraft map we have on our rotation is pretty shitty, especially compared to other minecraft maps out there that are good. And the thing that sucks is that most new people will choose it mainly because of the popularity of minecraft, and they half expect it to be a decent map. Let's just get rid of it already!
The current minecraft map sucks. That is all.
To be honest, id say a good 4-5 maps we have either need to be removed or the newer version downloaded. Minecraft and 67th Way being the main 2. we have a version of 67th way thats like 5 maps old.
+support we need a new minecraft map

I was literally just about to post this same topic.
+support
+support, the minecraft map we have now isn't for TTT.
I guess I stand alone when I say..I like the current minecraft map...<:  but It'd be cool to see a new one. so +support

>> We could just have both? 
Almost everyone above wrote that the current one sucks. Why would we have a map if it sucks?
Thanks for the good laugh, Dum.
